title: Ariel: Dancing on TV
description: The night before Ariel, a sixteen-year-old girl with a deformed hand, starts at the most prestigious dance school in Scotland, her mother tries to kill her.Torn from a life where she never fitted in, Ariel quickly becomes the focus of a reality TV show. In the castle school, she forms deep friendships and meets Alexander, the best looking boy she’s ever seen. Together, they unravel the mysteries of the castle's shadows and confront the demons of Ariel's past.Can she rise above a lifetime of pain and embrace the possibilities of fame and love that beckon to her?‘ Dancing on TV’ is a mesmerising tale of resilience and the pursuit of a brighter future against all odds.
author: Ailish Sinclair
